extensionDescription.message:
Quickly go through each of your tabs and decide on an action to get rid of it. (Inspired by the "Inbox to Zero" concept).
There are 4 actions available: (1) Pin tab (only for the most important), (2) Bookmark tab (in a folder inside "Other Bookmarks"), (3) Skip tab (in case you want to decide later), and (4) Close tab (plain and simple). After any of these actions, you go to the next tab from the list.
Avoid attachment! Simplify your browsing! Unhoard your tabs!
